publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-137 Mr Andrew Welsh: Motion Regarding Appointment of Auditor General for Scotland—That the Parliament nominates Robert Black to Her Majesty for appointment as Auditor General for Scotland.
S1M-137 Mr Andrew Welsh: Appointment of Auditor General for Scotland—That the Parliament nominates Robert Black to Her Majesty for appointment as Auditor General for Scotland.
S1M-137 Appointment of Auditor General for Scotland (lodged on 8 September 1999) Andrew Wilson*
